translations: n.影响力，手段；杠杆力，杠杆作用；<美>杠杆比率
v.<英>举债经营；充分利用（资源、观点等）

phrs.translation: 财务杠杆；财务杠杆作用
杠杆比率；杠杆率；资本充足率
杠杆效应，举债经营效果
营业杠杆作用；营业杠杆

sentences.sentence: His position as mayor gives him leverage to get things done.
sentences.translation: 他的市长身份使他有能力办成一些事情。

sentences.sentence: The move was a switch to leverage on the coverage of their fashion week show to make stock available immediately to consumers.
sentences.translation: 此举是一种转变，即利用时装周走秀的报道，让消费者立即可以买到库存。

sentences.sentence: Now some experts are proposing that we should take advantage of the teen brain's keen sensitivity to the presence of friends and leverage it to improve education.
sentences.translation: 现在一些专家提出，我们应该利用青少年的大脑对朋友在场的敏锐感知，并借助它来改善教育。
